meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Former Clinton Donors Sign On With Obama As Senator Hillary Rodham Clinton seeks to reassemble the Democratic money machine her husband built, some of its major fund-raisers, including two who slept in the Lincoln Bedroom at the White House, have already signed on with Senator Barack Obama.
Violence Mars Nigeria Vote At least 21 people were killed in violent protests over state elections in Nigeria. Partial results appeared to hand most of the victories to the governing party.
Business Travel With more in-flight food and entertainment options, airlines are giving their business customers the C.E.O. treatment.
A Number to Remember Five Seattle Mariners players were among the major leaguers who wore Jackie Robinson's No. 42 to honor the 60th anniversary of his breaking the baseball color barrier.

Violence Mars Nigeria Vote At least 21 people were killed in violent protests over state elections in Nigeria. Partial results appeared to hand most of the victories to the governing party.
Business Travel With more in-flight food and entertainment options, airlines are giving their business customers the C.E.O. treatment.
A Number to Remember Five Seattle Mariners players were among the major leaguers who wore Jackie Robinson's No. 42 to honor the 60th anniversary of his breaking the baseball color barrier.
